SEARCH
Package com.example.chicksevent.fragment

Class QRCodeScannerFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
com.example.chicksevent.fragment.QRCodeScannerFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
public class QRCodeScannerFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
Fragment for scanning QR codes to view event details.

Uses ZXing library to scan QR codes containing deep links (chicksevent://event/{eventId}). Automatically starts scanning when the fragment opens (if camera permission is granted).

  • Nested Class Summary
